body_html:
@vrv Looks like I have some trouble about different gmail and github account. I don't know how to resolve it. My usage scenario is :

  1. I use brchiu@ms35.hinet.net as my github account for my development purpose, commit this modification to my fork then create this pull request.
  2. my google account is biruei.chiu@gmail.com. I signed CLA using it and designate my github account as brchiu@ms35.hinet.net in contact information.

Please advice how to resolve this ?
Thanks.

body:
@vrv Looks like I have some trouble about different gmail and github account. I don't know how to resolve it. My usage scenario is : 

1) I use brchiu@ms35.hinet.net as my github account for my development purpose, commit this modification to my fork then create this pull request. 
2) my google account is biruei.chiu@gmail.com. I signed CLA using it and designate my github account as brchiu@ms35.hinet.net in contact information.

Please advice how to resolve this ?
Thanks.
